section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 80-1576, Princeton University and New Jersey against Schmid in a concurring opinion -- in a per curiam opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the appeal from the Supreme Court of the State of New Jersey is dismissed.
Justice Brennan took no part in the consideration of this case.
